Package bigshot.mp

Contains classes for multi core processing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ParallelFor<Result>
    Interface for parallel for-loops.
    WorkSetFactory
    Pluggable factory for WorkSets.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChildCallable<T>
    Callable that sets the name of the executing thread to the name of the thread used to create the callable.
    DefaultWorkSetFactory
    Default implementation of the WorkSetFactory interface.
    WorkSet<Result>
    A work set abstraction.

Package bigshot.mp Description

Contains classes for multi core processing. Use the WorkSet.setFactory(bigshot.mp.WorkSetFactory) method to plug in your own (system-wide) implementation.
See Also:
WorkSet
